entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person that Harry wants to know where he is going. She is kneeling beside an injured girl and holding her hand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who is trying to get Ginny's attention by passing nearby without speaking or looking back.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person that Harry has visited many times. He is described as having a great bearded face and being fond of rock cakes and giant grubs.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who vomited slugs during one of Hagrid's visits.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who helped Hagrid save Norbert.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a dragon that Hermione and Hagrid saved.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are a group of dark creatures that Harry can feel the chill of.

relationships.description: Harry wants Ginny to know where he is going.
Harry can feel the chill of Dementors.
